description: An aromatic curry that is lightly spiced with sweet pineapple.
keywords: Indian curry,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pineapple,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Duck, Pineapple & Vegetable Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 medium duck breasts, no skin or bone, excess fat removed.
1 medium red onion, peeled and diced
1 medium red capsicum, de-seeded and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the duck breasts into bite size portions.
Heat up a large saucepan to a medium heat, add the sesame oil and then add the onions and garlic.
Fry for 2 minutes and then add the duck and fry while tossing for a further 2 minutes.
Add the pepper and the tomatoes and fry for 2 more minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients, bring to the boil and then allow to simmer for 15 minutes stirring occasionally.
Remove from the heat and serve with a suggested side of naan breads and rice.
